dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating Moving Target Defense strategies in web applications, including configurations and attacker actions.

dcterms:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
dcterms:description: The National Vulnerability Database (NVD) contains information about security-related software vulnerabilities, including CVEs used for attacker actions in the study.
dcterms:title: National Vulnerability Database (NVD)
